text: Frank Borghi (April 9, 1925 â€“ February 2, 2015) was an American soccer player. He earned nine caps at goalkeeper for the United States national team. He played in the U.S. team's 1-0 victory over the hugely favored English in the 1950 FIFA World Cup. ==Other websites== *Frank Borghi entry in the National Soccer Hall of Fame *Frank Borghi: Where Are They Now?, National Soccer Hall of Fame Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American soccer players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Frank Borghi
